alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 8:39PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ventura and northwestern Los Angeles Counties through 930 PM PDT... At 838 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles west of Lake Hughes, or 25 miles north of Fillmore, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar and automated wind sensor. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alamo Mountain... Pyramid Lake... Interstate 5 over the Grapevine... Gorman... Frazier Mountain... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
